name: JobExplorer-forkids
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: job explorer
des:
Job Explorer provides an interactive exploration environment for children learning about the different professions in the world. 

It has launched with four professions, they are: 
 - astronaut
 - doctor
 - musician
 - Australian tour guide

Each profession is championed by a fictional character with a distinctly synthesized voice to help immerse you into the world of that job. 

You can learn about the personal story of the character, get facts about the job, learn about related jobs and complete badges. 

There are four badges per job focusing on core elements of the job. To earn a badge, the user needs to answer five questions correctly. The questions keep rotating through the non-answered ones until they are all complete.

Badge progress is saved so the you can complete the badges over whatever period of time you like.

Please direct feedback and questions to steven.bowden@protonmail.com otherwise you can leave feedback in the Alexa Skill Store which is always appreciated.


Privacy Information
This skill stores the user progress throughout job badges and job facts to enable continuation of game-play across multiple sessions. No personal information is collected. Data collected by the skill is not shared with any third party and only used for improving the skill performance.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
